description: Cannot play any audio or virtual instruments at all. Play button does not work after importing audio or creating a virtual instrument. Changing the audio backend does nothing. Instruction manual is a joke. Absolute trash program. No musician has time for this nonsense.

What a great gift to mankind this is 

I am really happy with this so far. It's hard to believe how nice of an application we're given free of charge.
I'd imagine thousands of hours beeing sunk into developing this, and I can only hope to appreciate it enough. I couldn't feel more grateful
summary: It's absurd that this is given free
